title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Pre-Service Teacher Training for Alleviating Math Learning Anxiety in Computer-Based Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of elementary mathematics curriculum and experience with assessment tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can analyze at least three factors causing math learning anxiety in computer-based assessment environments.
Preservice teachers can apply at least two anxiety-mitigation strategies when designing formative assessments using CAA tools.
Customized digital assessment plans for different learner levels can be developed through project-based scenarios, incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
